short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record and attach audio to Gmail compose window

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your voice into text effortlessly with our Audio-to-Email Converter Chrome extension. Designed to enhance your productivity, this tool allows you to record audio directly in your browser and automatically convert it into the body of your email. Ideal for professionals on the go, our extension ensures you can quickly and accurately compose emails without typing.
